channel.title: software on Ritual dust
channel.description: Recent content in software on Ritual dust

item.title: Software
item.description: Table of contents Visual tools Audio tools Coding tools Utilities Links Software tools for me are mostly a mean to an end, although I do enjoy building them if I have a specific problem and nothing is available that I find simple and efficient enough for the task. I’m currently migrating away from proprietary tools towards open source tools compatible with a wider range of OSes and that could run on my resilient computer .
